trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_000<tab>You wish to alter the properties of your Zodiac Weapon as granted by materia? Very well. Present to me a sphere scroll suitable for its enhancement.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_Q1_000_000<tab>Select the Zodiac Weapon Zeta whose properties you wish to alter.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_A1_000_010<tab><var 28 ((Item)) E8020A /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_A1_000_015<tab>Learn about the alteration process.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_A1_000_020<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_080<tab>Where is the weapon? Perchance you forgot to bring it?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>Please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> is equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_130<tab>Did you not bring a new sphere scroll? Know that I cannot fulfill your request without one.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>You do not possess <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>. Sphere scrolls can be obtained from Hubairtin by exchanging bottles of superior enchanted ink.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_150<tab>I shall remove the power of materia from your arm and transfer it to a sphere scroll.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_151<tab>After you have finished reinfusing the scroll as you desire, bring it back to me, and I shall bond its light energy with your Zodiac Weapon.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_YESNO_Q1<tab>The power of materia in <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> will be transferred to a sphere scroll. Proceed?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_YESNO_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>The sphere scroll has absorbed the materia-derived properties of your Zodiac Weapon Zeta. You may now redo the infusion process.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>When you are satisfied with the results, present the scroll to Jalzahn once more to have its light energy bonded with your weapon.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_157<tab>If you wish to remove some of the infusion from the sphere scroll, you may do so by speaking with Hubairtin at the Bonfire in central Thanalan.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_160<tab>This sphere scroll must be infused with more materia before we can avail ourselves of its power.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_161<tab>When it is positively aglow with light energy, I expect that it will enhance your weapon like so.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_170<tab>So you wish for your Zodiac Weapon to receive of this sphere scroll's power? Very well.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_171<tab>When the process is complete, the weapon will be enhanced like so.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_172<tab>...It is done! Your weapon has been born anew, my friend. May it serve you well.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_200<tab>If you wish to alter the materia-enhanced properties of your Zodiac Weapon, first we must transfer that power to a suitable sphere scroll. You may then go about reinfusing the scroll as you desire.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_JALZAHN_000_201<tab>When you are satisfied, return hither, and I shall bond the scroll's light energy with your weapon.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>Sphere scrolls may be obtained from Hubairtin at the Bonfire in exchange for bottles of superior enchanted ink.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON060ADJUST_00249_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Please note that only uninfused scrolls are suitable for the transfer process. Unwanted infusions may be removed by speaking with Hubairtin.
